title: Thomastown (TEFC)
creator_credit: Robert Newton, Lee Burton and Latrobe University. School of Education. Media Centre
brief_description: Thomastown High School allows students the freedom and responsibility to shape their own learning experiences and their own learning. This program is an account of the curriculum innovation at Thomastown High School, Victoria, between 1971-1982. Uses animation as well as live-action. Narrated by Lee Burton.
